channel.title: I just got firefox
channel.description: I just got firefox since I wanted the built in spell checker :P. Once it is complete, I have heard there are things that you can ad, such as an ad-blocker. What are the popular addons, and where do I get them?

item.title: I just got firefox
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

bobby:

I fixed that…But I want the tabs bar to always show. Also, I like the chat zilla one, it is nice.

FFS I just said poke around in the options.

Tooks -> Options -> Tabs -> Always show Tab bar.

Read full topic

I am sure Ron knows some

item.title: I just got firefox
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“bobby, post:3, topic:71124”]What are the popular ones ( I know mozilla has this page but i want what you guys use)

also, when I try and open the adblocker and chatzilla one, it says" file extention unknown" ???

also, how do I get rid of the: http://img73.imageshack.us/img73/258/75445291wy9.png

and make it so I always see what tabs are open, even if there is only one?[/quote]

As far as I know you can only get rid of the bookmark tookbar by deleting all bookmarks in it(right click -> Delete), as for seeing all tabs, poke around in the options. (Tools -> Options).

I personally use NoScript, AdBlock(and filterset), DownLoadThemAll and the German dictionary.

Read full topic

item.title: I just got firefox
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

bobby, you can right click and delete all of those annoying bookmarks, or you can right click near your address bar and un-check ‘bookmarks toolbar’

Also, to open up a new tab, you hit CTRL+T. I think thats what you are asking…

Read full topic

how do I get the tabs bar to always show (like on IE)?

item.title: I just got firefox
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

The built-in spellchecker is great, isn’t it?

I have so many extensions its not funny. The ones I find particularly useful are Tabbrowser Preferences, IE View, NoScript, and Web Developer Toolbar.

Read full topic

What are the popular ones ( I know mozilla has this page but i want what you guys use)

also, when I try and open the adblocker and chatzilla one, it says" file extention unknown" ???

also, how do I get rid of the: http://img73.imageshack.us/img73/258/75445291wy9.png

and make it so I always see what tabs are open, even if there is only one?

Read full topic

item.title: I just got firefox
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

In your bookmarks, there is already a folder with ‘getting started’
or
http://en-us.www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/customize/

Adblock Plus - The uber ad blocker.

Adblock Filterset.G Updater - Teh uber updater that keeps all your adblocking filters up to date.

Measure it - I use this just whenever you want to find the size quickly of something that you cant view its properties.

Imageshack toolbar (for firefox) - lets you drag and drop an image straight into any text box, like this ‘quick reply’ text box for example (and if you sign up for an imageshack account, it saves all your images under your name, and you can go back and view them whenever you want)

ReloadEvery - You never know when you want to refresh a page every __ seconds.

these are just the add-ons that I have. I find each one of them a must need for firefox, but there are hundreds of other add-ons out there as well.

Read full topic
